title: Private transaction issues on contract deployement
body:
In the same vein of https://github.com/hyperledger/besu/issues/5972, I've tried to deploy the same smart contract (Simple Storage) in a privacy group but the blockchain LOG throws the following message:

2023-10-03 07:07:53.141+00:00 | BftProcessorExecutor-QBFT-0 | ERROR | PrivacyPrecompiledContract | Failed to process private transaction 0x6ffaf02f8d6f27c398f9790d218456a3e2331f03d6c68b18f0a9851f77a30e0c: PRIVATE_TRANSACTION_FAILED
2023-10-03 07:07:53.526+00:00 | BftProcessorExecutor-QBFT-0 | ERROR | PrivacyPrecompiledContract | Failed to process private transaction 0x6ffaf02f8d6f27c398f9790d218456a3e2331f03d6c68b18f0a9851f77a30e0c: PRIVATE_TRANSACTION_FAILED
2023-10-03 07:07:53.529+00:00 | EthScheduler-Workers-0 | INFO  | PersistBlockTask | Block 9281 (0xd6cb6d9f33423b6f75628c50de8ee68d1169290717b154d3838a7caa4b753fdd) is already imported
2023-10-03 07:07:53.531+00:00 | BftProcessorExecutor-QBFT-0 | INFO  | QbftBesuControllerBuilder | Imported #9,281 / 1 tx / 0 pending / 21,512 (0.1%) gas / (0xd6cb6d9f33423b6f75628c50de8ee68d1169290717b154d3838a7caa4b753fdd)

As we can see, even though the transaction is failed, it is still successfully registered in the blockchain.  

On Tessera node side, it seems that there were no issues:
2023-10-03 07:07:49.773 [qtp1396895429-45] INFO  c.q.t.q2t.BesuTransactionResource - Enter Request : POST : /send
2023-10-03 07:07:49.913 [pool-1-thread-1] INFO  c.q.t.q.i.RestPayloadPublisher - Publishing message to http://40.83.121.219:9203/
2023-10-03 07:07:49.913 [pool-1-thread-2] INFO  c.q.t.q.i.RestPayloadPublisher - Publishing message to http://40.83.121.219:9303/
2023-10-03 07:07:50.006 [pool-1-thread-2] INFO  c.q.t.q.i.RestPayloadPublisher - Published to http://40.83.121.219:9303/
2023-10-03 07:07:50.030 [pool-1-thread-1] INFO  c.q.t.q.i.RestPayloadPublisher - Published to http://40.83.121.219:9203/
2023-10-03 07:07:50.033 [qtp1396895429-45] INFO  c.q.t.q2t.BesuTransactionResource - Exit Request : POST : /send
2023-10-03 07:07:50.033 [qtp1396895429-45] INFO  c.q.t.q2t.BesuTransactionResource - Response for send : 200 OK
2023-10-03 07:07:50.789 [pool-3-thread-1] INFO  c.q.t.p.p.PartyInfoBroadcaster - Started PartyInfo polling round
2023-10-03 07:07:50.798 [pool-3-thread-1] INFO  c.q.t.p.p.PartyInfoBroadcaster - Finished PartyInfo polling round
2023-10-03 07:07:53.056 [qtp1396895429-42] INFO  c.q.t.q2t.BesuTransactionResource - Enter Request : POST : /receive
2023-10-03 07:07:53.073 [qtp1396895429-42] INFO  c.q.t.t.i.TransactionManagerImpl - Lookup transaction 07AMkxe1E4PtCHwf5KXHMmgRFbAhRobEIQ4K3HSjdHE=
2023-10-03 07:07:53.115 [qtp1396895429-42] INFO  c.q.t.q2t.BesuTransactionResource - Exit Request : POST : /receive
2023-10-03 07:07:53.115 [qtp1396895429-42] INFO  c.q.t.q2t.BesuTransactionResource - Response for receive : 200 OK
2023-10-03 07:07:53.436 [qtp1396895429-49] INFO  c.q.t.q2t.BesuTransactionResource - Enter Request : POST : /receive
2023-10-03 07:07:53.437 [qtp1396895429-49] INFO  c.q.t.t.i.TransactionManagerImpl - Lookup transaction 07AMkxe1E4PtCHwf5KXHMmgRFbAhRobEIQ4K3HSjdHE=
2023-10-03 07:07:53.516 [qtp1396895429-49] INFO  c.q.t.q2t.BesuTransactionResource - Exit Request : POST : /receive
2023-10-03 07:07:53.516 [qtp1396895429-49] INFO  c.q.t.q2t.BesuTransactionResource - Response for receive : 200 OK
2023-10-03 07:07:54.293 [qtp1396895429-47] INFO  c.q.t.q2t.BesuTransactionResource - Enter Request : POST : /receive
2023-10-03 07:07:54.294 [qtp1396895429-47] INFO  c.q.t.t.i.TransactionManagerImpl - Lookup transaction 07AMkxe1E4PtCHwf5KXHMmgRFbAhRobEIQ4K3HSjdHE=
2023-10-03 07:07:54.305 [qtp1396895429-47] INFO  c.q.t.q2t.BesuTransactionResource - Exit Request : POST : /receive
2023-10-03 07:07:54.305 [qtp1396895429-47] INFO  c.q.t.q2t.BesuTransactionResource - Response for receive : 200 OK

As a matter of factor, it's not clear why this error comes up. The deployment script is attached. I don't understand where this problem comes from.




 
[SimpleStorage_contract.txt](https://github.com/hyperledger/besu/files/12789658/SimpleStorage_contract.txt)
[deploy_file.txt](https://github.com/hyperledger/besu/files/12789686/deploy_file.txt)
